data.Title: Google Search Console Performance Reporting Delays
data.Description: Google has confirmed it is working to fix delays and latency issues with the Google Search Console Performance reports. This issue, affecting performance and other reports, occurs periodically. Google usually resolves it over time, allowing reports to catch up.

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Conversion Data Usage Policy Change
data.Description: Google Merchant Center merchants received email notifications about changes in how Google collects and uses their shared conversion data. Google might utilize this data for new reporting methods, enhancing Google Search experiences and services.

data.Title: Bing Introduces "Prompt Injection" to Webmaster Guidelines
data.Description: Bing added a new guideline to its Bing Webmaster Guidelines named Prompt Injection. A prompt injection is a type of cyberattack against large language models (LLMs). Hackers disguise malicious inputs as legitimate prompts, manipulating generative AI systems (GenAI) into leaking sensitive data, spreading misinformation, or worse, according to IBM.

data.Title: Google Search Tests "Top Quality Store" Badge
data.Description: Google Search is experimenting with a "top quality store" badge displayed alongside website names in search results. This badge could influence user trust and click-through rates.

data.Title: Google Explains the Negative Impact of Soft 404 Errors
data.Description: Gary Illyes from Google explained two reasons why soft 404 errors are bad.  Soft 404s are when a page returns a 200 status okay, but Google thinks that page should return a 404 page not found error.  According to Gary, soft 404s are bad because they (1) limit crawl budget and (2) the pages won't likely show up in Google Search.

data.Title: Google June 2024 Spam Update Completed
data.Description: Confirmation that Google's June 2024 Spam Update has finished rolling out.

data.Title: YouTube May Allow Custom Playlist Thumbnails
data.Description: Rumor that YouTube may soon allow users to upload custom thumbnails for their playlists.

data.Title: OpenAI and Time Magazine Partner to Enhance ChatGPT
data.Description: OpenAI partners with Time magazine to provide ChatGPT with access to its archive of journalistic content.

data.Title: TikTok Developing AI Chatbot "Genie"
data.Description: Genie -> TikTok’s Developing a New AI Chatbot Called Genie, which could incorporate generative AI search "TikTok has sought to trademark the name “Genie” for its coming AI chatbot tool, which would enable users to pose questions in-stream, and get immediate responses, among…

data.Title: YouTube Updates Policy on AI-Generated Content
data.Description: YouTube rolled out a policy change that will let people request the takedown of AI-generated or other synthetic content that simulates their face or voice "The change allows people to request the removal of this type of AI content under YouTube’s privacy request process. It’s an…
